actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act for the purpose of making family-owned corporations and partnerships eligible for assistance with respect to real estate and operating loans under such Act.

summary.text: Amends the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to make family-owned corporations and partnerships eligible for real estate and operating loans.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act for the purpose of making family-owned corporations and partnerships eligible for assistance with respect to real estate and operating loans under such Act.
